A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too many plot holes and disappointing moments to rate this any higher. Leia coming out of space was dumb\, they took Luke in a bad direction\, the ship chase that lasted most of the movie was pointless and avoidable\, and Rey being a nobody is stupid as well. JJ Abrahms has a lot of work to do in episode ix to fill in the gaps and make the story better.
